scripts.export:html: pandoc --standalone --css resume.css '../content/2025-12-01 - Microsoft - Web Developer UI - Remote.md' -o build/Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.html
scripts.export:pdf: npm run export:html && mkdir -p ../output && weasyprint build/Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.html ../output/Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.pdf --stylesheet pdf-print.css
scripts.export:docx: npm run export:html && mkdir -p ../output && pandoc build/Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.html --reference-doc docx-reference.docx -o ../output/Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.docx && python3 scripts/normalize_docx_lists.py ../output/Bradley_Baysinger_Microsoft_UI.docx
